title: Grey's Anatomy star Jesse Williams wishes girlfriend Taylour Paige happy birthday amid divorce
text:
Jesse Williams went public with his relationship with actress Taylour Paige when the pair hit the red carpet for an event at the Apollo Theater in New York City in May.

Now some five months on, and the Grey's Anatomy star has gone Instagram public with birthday wishes for his new ladylove.

'HAAAPPPYY BIRRRFFDAYYY @taylour me mine,' the actor, 38, captioned a series of photos and videos of the couple enjoying each other's company during their short time together.

Public love: Jesse Williams wished girlfriend Taylour paige a happy 29th birthday on Instagram

Paige, who turned 29 on October 5, also took Instagram to share some videos and pictures from her birday festivities, which included a day at the park with Williams, among others.

The White Boy Rick actress also shared a photo of herself decked out in an off-the-shoulder black polka dot dress and with a big beaming smile on her face.

'Birthday biiiiiitch... so thankful for these dances around the sun!!!!!!' she wrote in the caption.

Happy birthday to me: Paige also shared a snap and birthday wishes to herself on Instagram

Festive: The White Boy Rick star also shared some quick video clips of the couple out with friends for her birthday in NYC

Romance rumor surrounding Williams and Paige were first sparked in January when they were spotted snuggling up together at the Sundance Film Festival in Utah, according to Us Weekly.

She has not been shy in sharing snaps and updates on their relationship on social media.

Williams, who has portrayed Dr. Jackson Avery on the hit ABC medical drama series since 2009, filed for divorce from Aryn Drake-Lee in April of 2017, after five years of marriage.

Family matters: The Grey's Anatomy star filed for divorce from Aryn Drake-Lee in April 2017; they have been battling over spousal and child support payments

The estranged couple's divorce has been playing out in the courts.

They failed to reach an agreement during a court-ordered mediation over Williams' $100,000 per month spousal and child support payments, according to The Blast in August.

Drake-Lee had requested that the actor pay an additional $200,000 to pay for her lawyer and a forensic accountant she hired to help with her court case.

The former couple share two young children together: daughter Sadie, five, and son Maceo, four.
description: Grey's Anatomy star Jesse Williams wished girlfriend Taylour Paige happy birthday as his divorce from Aryn Drake-Lee wages on in the courts.
